kuusisto.tinysound

Class TinySound

  • java.lang.Object
    • kuusisto.tinysound.TinySound

  • public class TinySound
extends Object
    TinySound is the main class of the TinySound system. In order to use the TinySound system, it must be initialized. After that, Music and Sound objects can be loaded and used. When finished with the TinySound system, it must be shutdown.
    Author:
    Finn Kuusisto

      • TinySound

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public static void init()
        Initialize Tinysound. This must be called before loading audio.

      • init

        public static void init(Mixer.Info info)
                 throws LineUnavailableException,
                        SecurityException,
                        IllegalArgumentException
        Alternative function to initialize TinySound which should only be used by those very familiar with the Java Sound API. This function allows the line that is used for audio playback to be opened on a specific Mixer.
        Parameters:
        info - the Mixer.Info representing the desired Mixer
        Throws:
        LineUnavailableException - if a Line is not available from the specified Mixer
        SecurityException - if the specified Mixer or Line are unavailable due to security restrictions
        IllegalArgumentException - if the specified Mixer is not installed on the system

      • shutdown

        public static void shutdown()
        Shutdown TinySound.

      • isInitialized

        public static boolean isInitialized()
        Determine if TinySound is initialized and ready for use.
        Returns:
        true if TinySound is initialized, false if TinySound has not been initialized or has subsequently been shutdown

      • getGlobalVolume

        public static double getGlobalVolume()
        Get the global volume for all audio.
        Returns:
        the global volume for all audio, -1.0 if TinySound has not been initialized or has subsequently been shutdown

      • setGlobalVolume

        public static void setGlobalVolume(double volume)
        Set the global volume. This is an extra multiplier, not a replacement, for all Music and Sound volume settings. It starts at 1.0.
        Parameters:
        volume - the global volume to set

      • loadMusic

        public static Music loadMusic(String name)
        Load a Music by a resource name. The resource must be on the classpath for this to work. This will store audio data in memory.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the Music resource
        Returns:
        Music resource as specified, null if not found/loaded

      • loadMusic

        public static Music loadMusic(String name,
              boolean streamFromFile)
        Load a Music by a resource name. The resource must be on the classpath for this to work.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the Music resource
        streamFromFile - true if this Music should be streamed from a temporary file to reduce memory overhead
        Returns:
        Music resource as specified, null if not found/loaded

      • loadMusic

        public static Music loadMusic(File file)
        Load a Music by a File. This will store audio data in memory.
        Parameters:
        file - the Music file to load
        Returns:
        Music from file as specified, null if not found/loaded

      • loadMusic

        Returns:
